xs.$description: Extra small alert padding (10px). Use for: compact inline alerts, form field errors, dense notification lists. Minimal visual footprint.

sm.$description: Small alert padding (12px). Use for: standard form validation, secondary notifications, space-efficient layouts.

md.$description: Medium alert padding (16px). DEFAULT. Use for: most alerts, system notifications, prominent user feedback. Good balance of prominence and space.

lg.$description: Large alert padding (20px). Use for: important system alerts, featured notifications, alerts with more content. More breathing room.

xl.$description: Extra large alert padding (32px). Use for: high-emphasis critical alerts, full-width banners, alerts with rich content or actions.

borderRadius.$description: Alert border radius (4px). Slight rounding softens the alert container. Matches other form/content containers for visual consistency.

borderWidth.$description: Alert border width (1px). Thin border provides subtle container definition. Border color varies by alert variant (error, warning, success, info).

size.$description: Alert icon size (20px). Sized to be clearly visible alongside title/message text without dominating. Proportional to typical alert padding.

gap.$description: Gap between icon and content (12px). Provides clear separation between status icon and alert text. Maintains visual association.

fontSize.$description: Alert title font size (14px). Same as body text but distinguished by weight. Keeps alerts compact while remaining readable.

fontWeight.$description: Alert title font weight (600). Semibold provides clear hierarchy between title and message without being overly heavy.

lineHeight.$description: Alert title line height (1.25). Tighter line height for single-line titles. Keeps alert compact vertically.

fontSize.$description: Alert message font size (14px). Standard body text size for readability. Matches title size but lighter weight.

lineHeight.$description: Alert message line height (1.5). More generous line height for multi-line messages. Improves readability of longer alert text.

size.$description: Close button size (18px). Clickable/tappable close icon. Sized for adequate touch target while not competing with alert content.

offset.$description: Close button offset from edge (12px). Positions close button away from container edge for comfortable interaction and visual balance.

duration.$description: Alert transition duration (200ms). Moderate duration allows the animation to be perceived without feeling slow. Balances awareness and efficiency.

enter.$description: Alert entrance easing (ease-out). Decelerating motion - alert arrives quickly and settles into place. Feels like it's sliding in.

exit.$description: Alert exit easing (ease-in). Accelerating motion - alert starts slow and speeds up as it leaves. Feels like it's sliding away.
